name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing and optimizing scalable microservices architecture. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Core**, **Spring Security**, and **RESTful APIs**, ensuring robust and secure service provision. Skilled in implementing authentication protocols like **OAuth2** and **JWT** and adept at integrating **Spring MVC** and **Spring Data Access**. Throughout my career, I have consistently contributed to successful projects at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, backed by a strong foundation in AI/ML pipelines and cloud-native architectures.
